name: Neon Dice (xT0b1as, liaxim)
description:
Camera: WASD
Moving: click on dice you want to move

Move as many dices to the end as you can. After every move the dice rolls how far you can move.

The number in the upper left corner is how far you can move

Share your highscores here https://discord.gg/EVyPejjaKc
